pr_title: Clean up temp file if not used.

timeline.message:
Clean up temp file if not used.

Fixes #7855

timeline.body:
![MAJOR](https://sonarsource.github.io/sonar-github/severity-major.png 'Severity: MAJOR') Exceptional return value of java.io.File.delete() ignored in com.vaadin.flow.server.frontend.JarContentsManager.copyJarEntryTrimmingBasePath(JarFile, ZipEntry, String, File) [![rule](https://sonarsource.github.io/sonar-github/rule.png)](https://sonar.projects.vaadin.com/coding_rules#rule_key=findbugs%3ARV_RETURN_VALUE_IGNORED_BAD_PRACTICE)
![MINOR](https://sonarsource.github.io/sonar-github/severity-minor.png 'Severity: MINOR') Do something with the "boolean" value returned by "delete". [![rule](https://sonarsource.github.io/sonar-github/rule.png)](https://sonar.projects.vaadin.com/coding_rules#rule_key=squid%3AS899)
timeline.bodyText:
Exceptional return value of java.io.File.delete() ignored in com.vaadin.flow.server.frontend.JarContentsManager.copyJarEntryTrimmingBasePath(JarFile, ZipEntry, String, File) 
 Do something with the "boolean" value returned by "delete".
timeline.bodyHTML:
Exceptional return value of java.io.File.delete() ignored in com.vaadin.flow.server.frontend.JarContentsManager.copyJarEntryTrimmingBasePath(JarFile, ZipEntry, String, File)
Do something with the "boolean" value returned by "delete".
timeline.author: vaadin-bot
